title: French Banking Giant BPCE to Roll Out Crypto Trading for 2M Retail Clients
contentSnippet: The service will allow customers to buy and sell BTC, ETH, SOL, and USDC through a separate digital asset account managed by Hexarq.

title: ‘European SEC’ proposal sparks licensing concerns, institutional ambitions
contentSnippet: Legal experts are concerned that transforming ESMA into the “European SEC” may hinder the licensing of crypto and fintech in the region.

title: Two Casascius Coins Holding 2K BTC Moved After 13 Years of Inactivity
contentSnippet: The Casascius coins were designed as offline cold storage with embedded private keys, but the project was shut down in 2013 due to regulatory pressure from FinCEN.

title: Bitcoin profit metric eyes 2-year lows in 'complete reset:' BTC analysis
contentSnippet: Bitcoin long-term holders lost interest in selling at $90,000, new research showed, as profitability of their BTC supply dried up.

title: BTC poised for December recovery on ‘macro tailwinds,' Fed rate cut: Coinbase
contentSnippet: Coinbase predicts a December recovery driven by rising global M2 liquidity and lower interest rates, but Fed Chair Powell’s remarks may limit upside, analysts say.

title: Coinbase Sees Crypto Recovery Ahead as Liquidity Improves and Fed Rate Cut Odds Climb
contentSnippet: The crypto exchange also took note of a so-called AI bubble that continues to go strong and a weaker U.S. dollar.

title: Why CFTC-approved spot Bitcoin, Ethereum trading is a 'massively huge deal'
contentSnippet: Gold has popped 4,000% following CFTC's approval in the 1970s, leaving Bitcoin and Ethereum with a similar scaling setup.

title: Professor Coin: When Bitcoin Sneezes—How Crypto and Equities Caught the Same Cold
contentSnippet: Academic literature finds that during periods of economic stress, correlations and spillovers between cryptocurrencies and equities spike.

title: How Much Longer Until We Consider the Bitcoin Power Law Model Invalid?
contentSnippet: As the gap between spot bitcoin price and the power law widens, investors are left questioning whether mean reversion is coming or if another cornerstone model is approaching its end.

title: The Grandma Test: When Your Mom Can Use DePIN, Mass Adoption Has Arrived
contentSnippet: Mass adoption doesn't happen when crypto enthusiasts start using the technology: it happens when your grandma does it without even realizing it, argues Uplink co-founder Carlos Lei.

title: Anthony Pompliano's Bitcoin Treasury Firm ProCap BTC Closes SPAC Merger Deal
contentSnippet: Shares in the company fell more than 50% this week as the merger approval went forward.

title: Stablecoin Adoption Is ‘Exploding' — Here's Why Wall Street Is Going All-In

title: LUNC Surges Over 160% in a Week as Do Kwon Sentencing and Token Burns Draw Traders
contentSnippet: The rally is driven by speculation that a final verdict could bring clarity to the project, as well as technical factors like token burns.

title: Euro Stablecoin Market Cap Doubles in Year After MiCA, Study Finds
contentSnippet: Prior to MiCA, euro-denominated stablecoins' market cap contracted by 48% in the year leading up to June 2024.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today

title: Western Union eyes inflation-resistant ‘stable cards’ as part of its stablecoin strategy
contentSnippet: Western Union will roll out a “stable card” for high-inflation economies and issue its own coin as part of a multi-pillar stablecoin and digital asset strategy.

title: Brokerage behind major crypto treasury deals eyes $10–12B public listing: FT
contentSnippet: New York brokerage Clear Street, a key underwriter of the crypto-treasury boom, is planning a $10–12 billion public listing.

title: Bitcoin treasury firms enter a ‘Darwinian phase’ as premiums collapse: Galaxy
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury firms are entering a “Darwinian phase” as equity premiums collapse, leverage turns into downside and DAT stocks flip to discounts, Galaxy warns.

title: 2,000 Bitcoin on the move: Rare Casascius coins awaken after 13 years
contentSnippet: The physical Bitcoin collectibles were minted when Bitcoin was trading for just $3.88 and $11.69 each, marking a massive potential return.

title: XRP Faces Downside Risk as Social Sentiment Turns Wildly Negative
contentSnippet: The turn in crowd mood comes after a two-month slide of roughly 31%, leaving the token vulnerable to further downside if risk appetite weakens across majors.

title: Strive calls on MSCI to rethink its ‘unworkable’ Bitcoin blacklist
contentSnippet: Strive CEO Matt Cole has urged the MSCI to “let the market decide” whether they want to include Bitcoin-holding companies in their passive investments.

title: New 'Postal' Game Canceled One Day After Reveal, Following Generative AI Allegations
contentSnippet: Postal: Bullet Paradise has been scrapped and the developer is shutting down after gamers claimed the trailer used generative AI assets.

title: Cantor Slashes Strategy Price Target By 59%, Remains 'Long-Term Bullish' on Bitcoin Giant
contentSnippet: Cantor Fitzgerald analysts significantly lowered their price target for Strategy (MSTR) shares, while reiterating an “Overweight” rating.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Dive as Liquidations Hit $500 Million—While Stocks Rise
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is back below the $90,000 mark as Ethereum flirts with another dip below $3,000—all while major stock indices stay green.

title: Indiana Lawmaker Pushes for Bitcoin in Pensions, Crypto Payment Protections
contentSnippet: A lawmaker in Indiana introduced legislation that would broaden access to Bitcoin and crypto exposure for savers in the Midwestern state.

title: Trump DOJ Wants Terra Founder Do Kwon Behind Bars for 12 Years, Citing SBF Sentence
contentSnippet: Federal prosecutors reserved the right to pursue up to 12 years for Terra founder Do Kwon in an August plea deal. Now, they’re seeking that maximum.

title: Maryland Man Sentenced for Helping North Korea Infiltrate US Tech Firms
contentSnippet: The scheme enabled overseas DPRK operatives to access sensitive government systems through fraudulent IT jobs.

title: 2-4% Crypto Dip! Sovereign Wealth Funds Buying BTC! CTFC approves U.S. Spot Crypto!

title: XRP ETFs near $1 Billion, Sovereign wealth funds buying Bitcoin, CFTC approves U.S spot crypto trading - Daily Crypto Recap
MetaMask（メタマスク）の使い方｜送金・スワップからトラブル対処まで図解

title: ビットコイン取引所を徹底比較：手数料・板の厚み・機能・取引しやすさ

title: Binance Japanとは？取扱暗号資産数63銘柄、9つの主要サービスを提供

title: アバランチ（AVAX）の特徴と将来性｜買い方をわかりやすく徹底解説

title: 「仮想通貨は万人のもの」、コインベースとJPモルガン・チェース提携発表

title: 評判･口コミでおすすめ仮想通貨取引所15社 個人投資家の評価は?
contentSnippet: コインチェック、bitFlyer、bitbank、GMOコインなど、国内大手のおすすめ暗号資産（仮想通貨）取引所のメリット・デメリットについて個人投資家の口コミ評価を集め、比較ランキングにしたページです。優先して口座開設すべき取引所探しに役立てて下さい。

title: 株価25%超高騰、米上場シャープリンク、イーサリアム保有量20万ETH突破
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のシャープリンクが7月4日時点でETH保有量20万5634枚を公開。イーサリアム財団に次ぐ規模となり、積極的な仮想通貨ETH投資戦略が再び注目される。
